title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.11 - Reporting of pesticide poisoning
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.11 - Reporting of pesticide poisoning

State Regulations

Every physician, health facility, and clinical laboratory in attendance on a person with confirmed or suspected pesticide poisoning or with any of the clinical laboratory results as described in section
22.12
of this Part, shall report such occurrence to the State Commissioner of Health within 48 hours. This report shall be on such forms or in such manner as prescribed by the State Commissioner of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
22.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
